name: Gravitation
description: Gravity is broken, something it attracts and something it repels. Often we are faced with what at first attracts us and then repels. In this animation, I wanted to convey this meaning. I hope each of you will see something for himself personally in it.  This picture is done in acrylic on cardboard, then digitized and animated.  The main concept in my NFTs is that I want to combine classic painting performance with digital animation.If through this symbiosis the usual becomes noticeable
